question:
You have arranged a meeting with a business partner.Unfortunately, you have to change the arrangement.Write a letter to your partner.


Explain the new arrangement
Apology for the changes
Explain the reason why the changes were needed.
text: I hope this letter finds you in better health and I am also boating from the same boat.I am going to write this letter to apologize to you for the sudden change in the arrangement which we did for the meeting.Unfortunately, the room we decided for the meeting needs to be changed.

The first and foremost step change the room of the meeting  on an urgent basis.Secondly ,check the power system  because I will deliver my ideas through the presentation  as well as check the space , it should be appropriate.

I want to apologise since it is an uphill task to arrange all things again on such  short notice.As you know ,my residence is  far from the meeting place and you live closer to the venue, therefore, I want you to manage all these arrangements

The date of our meeting is 24th April ,the hotel manager told me that on the same date there is some function and it might create a disturbance.I do not want to take any kind of risk since this conference helps us for future career
